Blog.post: Everyone changes weither its good or bad, everyone goes through a dramitcic change. I change and i realized i don't like change. I lost all of my good friends over a stupid fight and now we want 2 kick each others ass. I also woke up a little, grew a little, I realized tht my life itsn't tht best barbie doll life around. I realized how family reall treat you, who are your true friends, and i must admit i still don't know how they are. The there are good thing tht come out of bad things: like i spent more time with katelyn than i do at my house and she got me 2 like the things she likes. Like for instance; writting a journal. expressing my feelings, doing blogger, listening to dashboard confessionals (i love them now)and so many other things. I'm glad i'm in high school and so i can go meat new kids and make new friends I love you mike s. you helped me alot and i love you. Good luck on baseball and i go to all of your games defintatley. Peace Noreen
This is the end of me and mike, after going on and off for about 9 months it's the end. I hope we canc still be friends and i want you to know tht i miss you and i love you and i will always.
This is my first entry to something cool. peace
Katelyn thanks you for everything and i love you.. SIS... Bi Noreen

If your my friend please answer this: Are we friends or are we not You told me once; but i forgot So tell me now and tell me true So i can say, I'm here for you Of all the friends i ever meet Your the one I'll never forget And if I die before you do I'll go to heaven and wait for you And i hope you'll do it for em to This is for all my friends tht read my blog. I know i get madd at you guys somethimes, and there 1 i'm always mad at but we friends Bi love all my friends

I can't wait to get the hell out of here and go to ireland. Yes i'm going to ireland for the summer...the whole summer and i can't wait. It is going to b so exciting. I will b with the epople i really love. who care about me...care what i think and love me 4 me. Here i don't get th, all i get is bitches on my ass bothering me about the smallest little things, like children. i am so excited. and i can't wait...just 2 more weeks bi

Friday I wasn'y really in tht great of a mood. I was pissed 4 some reason. All my friends were doing stuff and i wasn't. I got into a fite with just about most of my firends (we made up now) but tht got me mad, so i went to play with my lil brother donnacha who is 10 and he best friend. And a 7 year old and guess what i had he best time in my whole life no kidding.It might sound said but its the god damn truth. Today i'm not as bad, i'm over katelyns again and the walk was funny as hell. Patti u crack my up. YOu are so jugement and rascist...."This is america"...LOL... Contunie 2 read my blog...i will post asap bi

Last nite I was a mess. I was pissed at everyone because of my stupid boss. She is a bitch. I don't like her and she dosen't like me. She goes out to have a cigarrette and talks about me. She talks about how I don't wasn't doing my job right. I think tht if she has shit 2 say the says it but not like "What does noreen do from the time she gets her until the time she leaves...she better start doing her job and stop bullshitting around" I don't care who u are u don't tlk 2 ur workers like tht because once i go to ireland this summer i an't coming back. Let the grl take my job perminatley because i don't care because she can her herself and everyone else there. Today i'm not goimg in so i won't be this bad tonite. lol peace
Katleyn is one of the coolest friends i ever had. And today is her birthday so everyone should give her a b-day shout out HAPPY BIRTHDAY KATELYN. peace noreen

Some people life is full of activity. Some people get up and do different things everyday. Have a different breakfast, wear different clothes, have your hair in a different style, wear different jewerly and even hang w/ different people Then there were people who have the same everyday same old life, same problems, same breakfast, same hair style, same friends, same everything And then theres me, a weird life. Some things are the same and some are different and no matter what is the same and or different i do it and get it over with. I got to run...In school....YES STAMFORD HIGH BABY!!!! but I got work to do (I'm a bad girl) love yah mike s. Thanks for the comments everyone Peace
